go_data.justification: NF1 acts as a tumor suppressor gene, its protein: neurofibromin 1, is a GTPase activator.

go_data.term: negative regulation of Ras signaling pathway
go_data.justification: NF1 inhibits Ras signaling through the mTOR kinase pathway.
Loss-of-function mutations in NF1 result in an enhanced cell proliferation through impaired Ras signaling inhibition.
NF1 acts as a tumor suppressor gene.
